config-import.title: Import Configuration
config-import.description: Import your settings from an old installation
config-import.pathInvalid: Invalid path. No configuration files found.
config-import.conflictWarning: Warning: Some files already exist and will be overwritten
config-import.noFilesFound: No configuration files found in the selected path

help.title: Help
help.description: This plugin helps you import your settings from an old installation.
help.step1: 1. Enter the full path of your old installation
help.step2: 2. Click 'Validate path' to check if configuration files exist
help.step3: 3. If the path is valid, click 'Import settings'
help.note: Note: Existing settings will be overwritten. Create a backup first!
